document_name: Ordinance (2020: 750) on state aid for certain environmental vehicles
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/SWE/2020/SWE-2020-08-13-Ordinance (2020: 750) on state aid for certain environmental vehicles_14281721c56c1d880fbee19bf1b628c2.pdf
document_description: This ordinance aims at promoting the introduction of environmental trucks and electric work machines on the market and contribute to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions.  It gives the Swedish Energy Agency the ability to provide grants for the purchase of such vehicles. The document lists bioethanol, natural gas or electrical energy from a fuel cell, a battery or an external source as clean fuels.
